typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		transaction_id as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		merchant_name as string,
		transaction_description as string,
		transaction_amount as integer,
		type_deposit_withdrawal as string,
		transaction_date as date,
		channel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Transactions
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
Transactions, customerIDs assert(expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectExists(Transactions@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'custIDExists'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_amount), false, 'transactionAmt')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TransactionsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['transactionsErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> transactionsErrors
